Metadata.name: An EPIC Persona 4 Golden Music Mod
Metadata.author: Century_
Metadata.description: A music mod that revamps the P4G OST with song changes that include tracks from Persona 4 Dancing, Persona 4 Reincarnation, The Persona 4 Animes, Persona 3(FES/Portable) Persona Q, Persona Q2, Super Smash Bros. Ultimate and even some Fan-Made music from Ode Imaginations and from the Re: Brilliance album.
